mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t3.enterprise_name, (SELECT maker_net_income FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND pay_enterprise_id = t1.pay_enterprise_id AND maker_id = #{param2}) AS pay_amount, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end FROM diyi_accept_paysheet t1 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t2 ON t1.pay_enterprise_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t3 ON t2.enterprise_id = t3.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1} AND #{param2} IN (IF(t1.accept_paysheet_type = 'SINGLE', (SELECT maker_id FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = t1.pay_maker_id), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(maker_id) FROM diyi_pay_maker t3 INNER JOIN diyi_accept_paysheet_list t4 ON t3.id = t4.pay_maker_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.accept_paysheet_id = t1.id)))

SELECT t4.id, t3.enterprise_name, t4.maker_net_income, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end, IF(t1.accept_paysheet_type = 'SINGLE', t1.accept_paysheet_url, NULL) AS accept_paysheet_url, t5.worksheet_name, t5.worksheet_type, t5.worksheet_mode, t5.create_time, t5.worksheet_no, t6.check_money, t6.achievement_desc, t6.achievement_files FROM diyi_accept_paysheet t1 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t2 ON t1.pay_enterprise_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t3 ON t2.enterprise_id = t3.id INNER JOIN diyi_pay_maker t4 ON t4.pay_enterprise_id = t1.pay_enterprise_id AND maker_id = #{param1} LEFT JOIN diyi_worksheet t5 ON t2.worksheet_id = t5.id AND t5.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN diyi_worksheet_maker t6 ON t5.id = t6.worksheet_id AND t6.maker_id = #{param1} AND t6.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.id = #{param2} AND #{param1} IN (IF(t1.accept_paysheet_type = 'SINGLE', (SELECT maker_id FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = t1.pay_maker_id), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(maker_id) FROM diyi_pay_maker t3 INNER JOIN diyi_accept_paysheet_list t4 ON t3.id = t4.pay_maker_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.accept_paysheet_id = t1.id)))

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.id, t2.charge_list_url, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end, t2.worksheet_id, t1.accept_paysheet_url, t1.create_time, IF(t1.accept_paysheet_type = 'SINGLE', (SELECT t3.name FROM diyi_maker t3 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_maker t4 ON t3.id = t4.maker_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.id = t1.pay_maker_id), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t5.name) FROM diyi_maker t5 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_maker t6 ON t5.id = t6.maker_id INNER JOIN diyi_accept_paysheet_list t7 ON t6.id = t7.pay_maker_id WHERE t5.is_deleted = 0 AND t6.is_deleted = 0 AND t7.is_deleted = 0 AND t7.accept_paysheet_id = t1.id)) AS names FROM diyi_accept_paysheet t1 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t2 ON t1.pay_enterprise_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1}) temp WHERE 1=1
AND temp.names LIKE concat('%', #{param2.name}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(temp.create_time, #{param2.beginDate}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(temp.create_time, #{param2.endDate}) <= 0

SELECT t1.id, t3.enterprise_name, t4.service_provider_name, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end, t2.worksheet_id, t2.charge_list_url, t1.accept_paysheet_url, t1.create_time FROM diyi_accept_paysheet t1 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t2 ON t1.pay_enterprise_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t3 ON t2.enterprise_id = t3.id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider t4 ON t2.service_provider_id = t4.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.id = #{param1}

SELECT t4.id, t4.name, t4.idcard_no, t4.phone_number, t4.bank_card_no, IF(t4.idcard_verify_status = 'VERIFYPASS', TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_real_name_verify, IF((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = t4.id AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND agreement_type = 'MAKERJOINAGREEMENT') > 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = t4.id AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND agreement_type = 'MAKERPOWERATTORNEY') > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_sign, IF(t3.achievement_files = '', FALSE, TRUE) AS boolAchievement, t3.check_money, IFNULL((SELECT accept_paysheet_url FROM diyi_accept_paysheet WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND pay_enterprise_id = t1.pay_enterprise_id AND maker_id = t3.maker_id AND accept_paysheet_type = 'SINGLE'), (SELECT accept_paysheet_url FROM diyi_accept_paysheet WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND pay_enterprise_id = t1.pay_enterprise_id AND accept_paysheet_type = 'MANY')) AS accept_paysheet_url FROM diyi_accept_paysheet t1 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_enterprise t2 ON t1.pay_enterprise_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_worksheet_maker t3 ON t2.worksheet_id = t3.worksheet_id INNER JOIN diyi_maker t4 ON t3.maker_id = t4.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.id = #{param1}
SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet WHERE pay_enterprise_id = #{param1}
